author: gmelachr
body: Following the pull request https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42464 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42498 this is a new PR to backport changes in CMSSW_13_0_X
title: Changes to store Daughters of Kshort and Lambda in the miniAOD prunedGenParticle Collection (backport to CMSSW_13_0_X)
